function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of zoonotic diseases from wildlife to domestic animals or human communities","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission to domestic animals and human communities, leading to potential outbreaks and public health risks","Mitigation":"Close monitoring and surveillance of wildlife populations, promoting proper handling and hygiene practices when interacting with wildlife, and public education on zoonotic disease risks","Technologies":"Remote monitoring systems, diagnostic tools for zoonotic diseases, and educational campaigns","People":"Local communities, wildlife conservationists, and public health organizations","Owner":"Wildlife conservation organizations, public health agencies, and local authorities"},{"Description":"Impact on livelihoods and food security leading to increased exploitation of wildlife and habitats","Impact":"Increased exploitation of wildlife and habitats, including illegal activities and trafficking, leading to depletion of species and disruption of ecosystems","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable alternative livelihood options, providing support for local communities, and increasing enforcement of wildlife protection laws","Technologies":"Sustainable agriculture practices, community development programs, and surveillance and enforcement technologies","People":"Local communities, wildlife conservationists, and law enforcement authorities","Owner":"Wildlife conservation organizations, local authorities, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Disturbances and reduction in protection efforts leading to illegal trafficking of wildlife","Impact":"Increased illegal trafficking of wildlife due to disturbances, collapse of livelihoods, and reduced enforcement efforts, leading to depletion of species and disruption of ecosystems","Mitigation":"Enhanced protection and enforcement efforts, community engagement in conservation, and sustainable development initiatives to reduce poverty and instability","Technologies":"Surveillance and enforcement technologies, community engagement platforms, and sustainable development tools","People":"Local communities, law enforcement, and wildlife conservationists","Owner":"Government agencies, wildlife conservation organizations, and community leaders"}]}
